Text: Free Shipping on Office XP Suites and UpgradesFpst Dear Amazon Customer As someone who has purchased business and inve sting books in the past you might like to know about the upcoming release of Microsoft Office XP To celebrate for a limited time were offering f ree shipping on your order of any Office XP suite or upgrade Why make th e leap to Office XP In addition to a better design and a more efficient wo rk experience for home or business use here are our top three reasons to u pgrade New document recovery feature that lets you save files at the moment an error message appears so you dont lose valuable documents spre adsheets database entries or presentations Task panes that provide yo u with easy access to all important tasks from one single integrated view Contextsensitive smart tags that link to names dates addresses phon e numbers and stock symbolswhere and when you need them Visit our Hom e Office Computing bookstore too for titles to complement your softwar e purchase Youll find Microsoft software books handheld and Internet gui des troubleshooting resources and lots more Check out our Microsoft Store today and discover even more reasons to upgrade to Office XP includ ing a buying guide to pinpoint the best version for you Dont delaypreo rder your copy now to secure free shipping for Office XP Sincerely IMA GE Gisele Toueg Business Office Editor Software Amazoncom En joy free shipping on all Microsoft Office XP suites Save on t he booksOffice XP Inside Out and Office XP Step by Step and get the mos t out of your XP upgrade Sign up to get regular email updates from our expert editors on Home Office Computing Books We hope you enjoyed receiving this message However if youd rather not receive future emails of this sort from Amazoncom please visit your Am azoncom account page and under the Your Account Settings heading click t he Update your communication preferences link Please note that this email was sent to the following address c tenroncom

Free Shipping on Office XP Suites and UpgradesAmazon Customer As someone who has purchased business and investing books in the past you might like to know about the upcoming release of Microsoft Office XP To celebrate for a limited time were offering free shipping on your order of any Office XP suite or upgrade Why make the leap to Office XP In addition to a better design and a more efficient work experience for home or business use here are our top three reasons to upgrade New document recovery feature that lets you save files at the moment an error message appears so you dont lose valuable documents spreadsheets database entries or presentations Task panes that provide you with easy access to all important tasks from one single integrated view Contextsensitive smart tags that link to names dates addresses phone numbers and stock symbolswhere and when you need them Visit our Home Office Computing bookstore too for titles to complement your software purchase Youll find Microsoft software books handheld and Internet guides troubleshooting resources and lots more Check out our Microsoft Store today and discover even more reasons to upgrade to Office XP including a buying guide to pinpoint the best version for you Dont delaypreorder your copy now to secure free shipping for Office XP Sincerely IMAGE Gisele Toueg Business Office Editor Software Amazoncom Enjoy free shipping on all Microsoft Office XP suites Save on the booksOffice XP Inside Out and Office XP Step by Step and get the most out of your XP upgrade Sign up to get regular email updates from our expert editors on Home Office Computing Books We hope you enjoyed receiving this message However if youd rather not receive future emails of this sort from Amazoncom please visit your Amazoncom account page and under the Your Account Settings heading click the Update your communication preferences link Please note that this email was sent to the following address
